short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A tool for comfortable browsing with automatic reloading of X

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This tool is designed to make X easier to read. Currently, manual operation is required for reloading, and a single post is too long vertically for good visibility, even when trying to get a lot of information. We have developed a tool to display a lot of information at once.
